Title: Uncle P

reviewText: I enjoyed this family themed movie that had good values and the actors/actresses dont get on your nerves.  It does'nt get too sentimental andhas a good ending....I was very pleased to see Cheech  from Cheech and Chong appear in thisone...and as usual he is still the man.enjoy
summary: Good little movie..... for the family...
Title: Uncle P

reviewerName: John M. Roberts "John Roberts Bible reader"
reviewText: All I can say is this is an awesome movie. Fun for all ages. I definitely recommend this movie.
summary: This is the way movies should be made.
Title: Uncle P

reviewText: Great family movie,  great for the kids to watch and enjoy the little girl is so cute and innocent. Loved how Master P came thru for his family when they needed him the most.  This is a touching story one that I truly love.
Title: Uncle P

reviewText: I love this movie and I think that it is a good movie for the family including all ages.  The whole family loves it.
Title: Uncle P

reviewText: UNCLE P IS A GREAT FAMILY MOVIE. I PURCHASED IT BECAUSE MY 3 YEAR OLD DAUGHTER LOVED "ARE WE THERE" AND SHE FELL IN LOVE THIS UNCLE P MOVIE TOO.  THIS IS A GOOD MOVIE THAT KIDS AND ADULTS AND WATCH AT THE SAME TIME AND BE ENTERTAINED.
Title: Uncle P
